description: Try our easy to follow Cheese-Stuffed Baked Chicken & Lemony Veg recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheese-Stuffed Baked Chicken & Lemony Veg Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 carrots, sliced at an angle into 4cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Place chicken onto a chopping board. Using your fingers, separate the skin from the meat to form a pocket. Fill with cheese and season.
Heat oil in a large roasting pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken, potato, onion, carrot and lemon, and cook for 10 minutes or until golden on all sides. Add tarragon and cream.
Transfer pan to oven. Cook for 20 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
